content.transcript: The meeting opened with a status update from the project manager. Key milestones were reviewed. The integration phase has encountered minor delays due to API version changes. The development team proposed adjusting the timeline by one week. Budget implications were discussed and approved by finance. Risks were assessed and logged. The next steps include finalizing the test plan and scheduling the UAT environment.
content.notes:
- Milestones reviewed
- Delay due to API changes
- Timeline extended by one week
- Budget approved
- Risk log updated

organization.name: Enterprise Solutions Ltd.
organization.description: A leading provider of enterprise software solutions.
